Articles.Content:
Or arthers of the mod no longer fix things?

Peppie23 (the OP of release thread) lase visited 2016-12-17, so..

I expect remotetech will broken in 1.1..

Its still being worked on...
Peppie isnt the only RT dev. From the bottom of the OP:

RT2 v1.4.0 and beyond is maintained by the Remote Technologies Group, a community effort to ensure the proliferation of unmanned vessels throughout the known Kerbalverse: Erendrake, Pezmc, Starstrider42, Peppie23, woogoose.

Additional contributions were made by Dail8859, Grays, Jsartisohn, MOARdV, and Reignerok.
